description.full: Las Vegas magician Cris Johnson (Nicolas Cage) has a secret which is a gift and a curse which torments him: he can see a few minutes into the future. Sick of the examinations he underwent as a child and the interest of the government in his power. He lies low under an assumed name in Vegas, Performing cheap tricks and living of small gambling “winnings”. But when a terrorist group threatens LA with a nuclear device, government agent Callie Ferries (Julianne Moore) must convince Cris to help her stop the cataclysm.
